It reminds the plain old days of conventional banking with having to struggle for small things and still remaining clueless about the service request status.
replyContent: Hey Manoj! Regret the hassle experience. In case, if you've completed the KYC through Equitas support, the KYC status will not get updated in the NiyoX app. The card will be sent to you by the bank within 7-15 days. For further help on it, we'd request you to contact Equitas support at 18001031222 or at customerservice@equitasbank.com - AD.
